   19: %%
   20: -module(edlin_expand_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   22: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: -export([normal/1, quoted_fun/1, quoted_module/1, quoted_both/1, erl_1152/1,
   25:          erl_352/1, unicode/1]).
   26: 
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   30:     cleanup(),
   31:     Config.
   32: 
   33: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   34:     ok.
   35: 
   36: suite() ->
   37:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   38:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   39: 
   40: all() -> 
   41:     [normal, quoted_fun, quoted_module, quoted_both, erl_1152, erl_352,
   42:      unicode].
   43: 
   44: groups() -> 
   45:     [].
   46: 
   47: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     ok.
   52: 
   53: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: cleanup() ->
   60:     [try
   61:          code:purge(M),
   62:          code:delete(M)
   63:      catch _:_ -> ok end || M <- [expand_test, expand_test1,
   64:                                   'ExpandTestCaps', 'ExpandTestCaps2']].
   65: 
   66: normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   67:     {module,expand_test} = compile_and_load(Config,expand_test),
   68:     %% These tests might fail if another module with the prefix
   69:     %% "expand_" happens to also be loaded.
   70:     {yes, "test:", []} = do_expand("expand_"),
   71:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("expandXX_"),
   72:     {no,[],
   73:      [{"a_fun_name",1},
   74:       {"a_less_fun_name",1},
   75:       {"b_comes_after_a",1},
   76:       {"expand0arity_entirely",0},
   77:       {"module_info",0},
   78:       {"module_info",1}]} = do_expand("expand_test:"),
   79:     {yes,[],[{"a_fun_name",1},
   80: 	     {"a_less_fun_name",1}]} = do_expand("expand_test:a_"),
   81:     {yes,"arity_entirely()",[]} = do_expand("expand_test:expand0"),
   82:     ok.
   83: 
   84: %% Normal module name, some function names using quoted atoms.
   85: quoted_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   86:     {module,expand_test} = compile_and_load(Config,expand_test),
   87:     {module,expand_test1} = compile_and_load(Config,expand_test1),
   88:     %% should be no colon after test this time
   89:     {yes, "test", []} = do_expand("expand_"),
   90:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("expandXX_"),
   91:     {no,[],[{"'#weird-fun-name'",1},
   92: 	    {"'Quoted_fun_name'",0},
   93: 	    {"'Quoted_fun_too'",0},
   94: 	    {"a_fun_name",1},
   95: 	    {"a_less_fun_name",1},
   96: 	    {"b_comes_after_a",1},
   97: 	    {"module_info",0},
   98: 	    {"module_info",1}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:"),
   99:     {yes,"_",[]} = do_expand("expand_test1:a"),
  100:     {yes,[],[{"a_fun_name",1},
  101: 	     {"a_less_fun_name",1}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:a_"),
  102:     {yes,[],
  103:      [{"'#weird-fun-name'",1},
  104:       {"'Quoted_fun_name'",0},
  105:       {"'Quoted_fun_too'",0}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'"),
  106:     {yes,"uoted_fun_",[]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'Q"),
  107:     {yes,[],
  108:      [{"'Quoted_fun_name'",0},
  109:       {"'Quoted_fun_too'",0}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'Quoted_fun_"),
  110:     {yes,"weird-fun-name'(",[]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'#"),
  111: 
  112:     %% Since there is a module_info/1 as well as a module_info/0
  113:     %% there should not be a closing parenthesis added.
  114:     {yes,"(",[]} = do_expand("expand_test:module_info"),
  115:     ok.
  116: 
  117: quoted_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     {module,'ExpandTestCaps'} = compile_and_load(Config,'ExpandTestCaps'),
  119:     {yes, "Caps':", []} = do_expand("'ExpandTest"),
  120:     {no,[],
  121:      [{"a_fun_name",1},
  122:       {"a_less_fun_name",1},
  123:       {"b_comes_after_a",1},
  124:       {"module_info",0},
  125:       {"module_info",1}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps':"),
  126:     {yes,[],[{"a_fun_name",1},
  127: 	     {"a_less_fun_name",1}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps':a_"),
  128:     ok.
  129: 
  130: quoted_both(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  131:     {module,'ExpandTestCaps'} = compile_and_load(Config,'ExpandTestCaps'),
  132:     {module,'ExpandTestCaps1'} = compile_and_load(Config,'ExpandTestCaps1'),
  133:     %% should be no colon (or quote) after test this time
  134:     {yes, "Caps", []} = do_expand("'ExpandTest"),
  135:     {no,[],[{"'#weird-fun-name'",0},
  136: 	    {"'Quoted_fun_name'",0},
  137: 	    {"'Quoted_fun_too'",0},
  138: 	    {"a_fun_name",1},
  139: 	    {"a_less_fun_name",1},
  140: 	    {"b_comes_after_a",1},
  141: 	    {"module_info",0},
  142: 	    {"module_info",1}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':"),
  143:     {yes,"_",[]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':a"),
  144:     {yes,[],[{"a_fun_name",1},
  145: 	     {"a_less_fun_name",1}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':a_"),
  146:     {yes,[],
  147:      [{"'#weird-fun-name'",0},
  148:       {"'Quoted_fun_name'",0},
  149:       {"'Quoted_fun_too'",0}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'"),
  150:     {yes,"uoted_fun_",[]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'Q"),
  151:     {yes,[],
  152:      [{"'Quoted_fun_name'",0},
  153:       {"'Quoted_fun_too'",0}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'Quoted_fun_"),
  154:     {yes,"weird-fun-name'()",[]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'#"),
  155:     ok.
  156: 
  157: %% Note: pull request #1152.
  158: erl_1152(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  159:     "\n"++"foo"++"    "++[1089]++_ = do_format(["foo",[1089]]),
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: erl_352(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  163:     erl_352_test(3, 3),
  164: 
  165:     erl_352_test(3, 75),
  166:     erl_352_test(3, 76, [trailing]),
  167:     erl_352_test(4, 74),
  168:     erl_352_test(4, 75, [leading]),
  169:     erl_352_test(4, 76, [leading, trailing]),
  170: 
  171:     erl_352_test(75, 3),
  172:     erl_352_test(76, 3, [leading]),
  173:     erl_352_test(74, 4),
  174:     erl_352_test(75, 4, [leading]),
  175:     erl_352_test(76, 4, [leading]),
  176: 
  177:     erl_352_test(74, 74, [leading]),
  178:     erl_352_test(74, 75, [leading]),
  179:     erl_352_test(74, 76, [leading, trailing]).
  180: 
  181: erl_352_test(PrefixLen, SuffixLen) ->
  182:     erl_352_test(PrefixLen, SuffixLen, []).
  183: 
  184: erl_352_test(PrefixLen, SuffixLen, Dots) ->
  185:     io:format("\nPrefixLen = ~w, SuffixLen = ~w\n", [PrefixLen, SuffixLen]),
  186: 
  187:     PrefixM = lists:duplicate(PrefixLen, $p),
  188:     SuffixM = lists:duplicate(SuffixLen, $s),
  189:     LM = [PrefixM ++ S ++ SuffixM || S <- ["1", "2"]],
  190:     StrM = do_format(LM),
  191:     check_leading(StrM, "", PrefixM, SuffixM, Dots),
  192: 
  193:     PrefixF = lists:duplicate(PrefixLen, $p),
  194:     SuffixF = lists:duplicate(SuffixLen-2, $s),
  195:     LF = [{PrefixF ++ S ++ SuffixF, 1} || S <- ["1", "2"]],
  196:     StrF = do_format(LF),
  197:     true = check_leading(StrF, "/1", PrefixF, SuffixF, Dots),
  198: 
  199:     ok.
  200: 
  201: check_leading(FormStr, ArityStr, Prefix, Suffix, Dots) ->
  202:     List = string:tokens(FormStr, "\n "),
  203:     io:format("~p\n", [List]),
  204:     true = lists:all(fun(L) -> length(L) < 80 end, List),
  205:     case lists:member(leading, Dots) of
  206:         true ->
  207:             true = lists:all(fun(L) ->
  208:                                      {"...", Rest} = lists:split(3, L),
  209:                                      check_trailing(Rest, ArityStr,
  210:                                                     Suffix, Dots)
  211:                              end, List);
  212:         false ->
  213:             true = lists:all(fun(L) ->
  214:                                      {Prefix, Rest} =
  215:                                          lists:split(length(Prefix), L),
  216:                                      check_trailing(Rest, ArityStr,
  217:                                                     Suffix, Dots)
  218:                              end, List)
  219:     end.
  220: 
  221: check_trailing([I|Str], ArityStr, Suffix, Dots) ->
  222:     true = lists:member(I, [$1, $2]),
  223:     case lists:member(trailing, Dots) of
  224:         true ->
  225:             {Rest, "..." ++ ArityStr} =
  226:                 lists:split(length(Str) - (3 + length(ArityStr)), Str),
  227:             true = lists:prefix(Rest, Suffix);
  228:         false ->
  229:             {Rest, ArityStr} =
  230:                 lists:split(length(Str) - length(ArityStr), Str),
  231:             Rest =:= Suffix
  232:     end.
  233: 
  234: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  235:     {module,unicode_expand} = compile_and_load(Config,'unicode_expand'),
  236:     {no,[],[{"'кlирилли́ческий атом'",0},
  237:             {"'кlирилли́ческий атом'",1},
  238:             {"'кlирилли́ческий атомB'",1},
  239:             {"module_info",0},
  240:             {"module_info",1}]} = do_expand("unicode_expand:"),
  241:     {yes,"рилли́ческий атом", []} = do_expand("unicode_expand:'кlи"),
  242:     {yes,"еский атом", []} = do_expand("unicode_expand:'кlирилли́ч"),
  243:     {yes,"(",[]} = do_expand("unicode_expand:'кlирилли́ческий атомB'"),
  244:     "\n'кlирилли́ческий атом'/0   'кlирилли́ческий атом'/1   "
  245:     "'кlирилли́ческий атомB'/1  \nmodule_info/0             "
  246:     "module_info/1             \n" =
  247:         do_format([{"'кlирилли́ческий атом'",0},
  248:                    {"'кlирилли́ческий атом'",1},
  249:                    {"'кlирилли́ческий атомB'",1},
  250:                    {"module_info",0},
  251:                    {"module_info",1}]),
  252:     ok.
  253: 
  254: do_expand(String) ->
  255:     edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse(String)).
  256: 
  257: do_format(StringList) ->
  258:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(StringList)).
  259: 
  260: compile_and_load(Config,Module) ->
  261:     Filename = filename:join(
  262:                  proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  263:                  atom_to_list(Module)),
  264:     {ok,Module,Bin} = compile:file(Filename, [binary]),
  265:     code:load_binary(Module, Filename, Bin).
